I have converted all but the concatMapSingle since it would need to be
.concatMapSingle(ice -> Single.fromCompletionStage(raiseEventForInitialTransfer(generatedId, ice, l.clustered(), kc, kv).thenApply(ignore2 -> ice)))
TBH I wish there was just a delayStage(Function<Object, CompletionStage<?>) method or something similar.

replies.bodyText:
Right, I didn't realize that raiseEventForInitialTransfer's CompletionStage yields null so can't be converted to a Single.
I do have one small extra request: please move raiseEventForInitialTransfer to the next line, the current formatting makes it look like l.clustered() is a parameter of delay().
